official_title: A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, clarifying the Federal pilot requirements.

summary.text: Requires the designation of areas near Prince William Sound, Alaska, on which a vessel is not required to be under the direction and control of a federally licensed pilot.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, clarifying the Federal pilot requirements.
